title: Microsoft teams up with Blizzard to stream Blizzcon 2015 to the Xbox One
text:
Microsoft teams up with Blizzard to stream Blizzcon 2015 to the Xbox One 
Published By: WPCentral.com - Today 
If you own an Xbox One and you're a fan of Blizzard games, you're in for a treat. Microsoft has teamed up with Blizzard to offer a live stre...
